title: Programmer
description: Built and maintained a web application for construction facilities to track their sales and stock called Rambuta using Angular (web) and Flutter (mobile). Created an e-commerce website where members can exchange their points for products and vouchers named MSTR with the Laravel framework. Developed a payment portal for online transactions that is responsive for both web and mobile with Flutter. Designed several on-going mobile applications using Figma.

title: Junior Programmer
description: Helped develop the marketplace website for Guggemo by converting the planned design on Figma into a functional website with the Angular framework. Used Jira to track tasks in sprints and Github to collaborate remotely.

title: Web Developer Intern
description: Developed a website to promote a yearly program called Girls in Engineering & Tech. Prepared presentation slides in Canva and taught an online web development coding class for primary students. Managed and maintained Penang Science Cluster's official website with WordPress.
